verses.verse: לְמוֹאָ֡ב <S%H4124><s%> Against Moab כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ה֤וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נְבוֹ֙ <S%H5015><s%> unto Nebo כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדָּ֔דָה <S%H7703><s%> for it is spoiled הֹבִ֥ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> is confounded נִלְכְּדָ֖ה <S%H3920><s%> [and] taken קִרְיָתָ֑יִם <S%H7156><s%> Kiriathaim הֹבִ֥ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> is confounded הַמִּשְׂגָּ֖ב <S%H4869><s%> Misgab וָחָֽתָּה׃ <S%H2865><s%> and dismayed

אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> longer תְּהִלַּ֣ת <S%H8416><s%> [There shall be] no more praise מוֹאָב֒ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בְּחֶשְׁבּ֗וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon חָשְׁב֤וּ <S%H2803><s%> they have devised עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> her Come וְנַכְרִיתֶ֣נָּה <S%H3772><s%> and let us cut it off מִגּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> from [being] a nation גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again מַדְמֵ֣ן <S%H4086><s%> O Madmen תִּדֹּ֔מִּי <S%H1826><s%> Also thou shalt be cut down אַחֲרַ֖יִךְ <S%H310><s%> thee תֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> her Come חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> the sword

ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A voice צְעָקָ֖ה <S%H6818><s%> of crying מֵחֹֽרוֹנָ֑יִם <S%H2773><s%> [shall be] from Horonaim שֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> spoiling וָשֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> and great
נִשְׁבְּרָ֖ה <S%H7665><s%> is destroyed מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab הִשְׁמִ֥יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard זְּעָקָ֖ה <S%H2201><s%> have caused a cry [צְעֹורֶיהָ כ] (צְעִירֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6810><s%> least ק)

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> by מַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> For in the going up [הַלֻּחֹות כ] (הַלּוּחִ֔ית <S%H3872><s%> Luhith ק) בִּבְכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> continual יַֽעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> shall go up בֶּ֑כִי <S%H1065><s%> weeping כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> at בְּמוֹרַ֣ד <S%H4174><s%> for in the going down חוֹרֹנַ֔יִם <S%H2773><s%> of Horonaim צָרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> the enemies צַֽעֲקַת־ <S%H6818><s%> a cry שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> of destruction שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> have heard

נֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Flee מַלְּט֣וּ <S%H4422><s%> save נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> your lives וְתִֽהְיֶ֕ינָה <S%H1961><s%> and be כַּעֲרוֹעֵ֖ר <S%H6176><s%> like the heath בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> For יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> because בִּטְחֵ֤ךְ <S%H982><s%> For because thou hast trusted בְּמַעֲשַׂ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H4639><s%> in thy works וּבְא֣וֹצְרוֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H214><s%> and in thy treasures גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you תִּלָּכֵ֑דִי <S%H3920><s%> thou shalt also be taken וְיָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth [כְמִישׁ כ] (כְמֹושׁ֙ <S%H3645><s%> Chemosh ק) בַּגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> into captivity כֹּהֲנָ֥יו <S%H3548><s%> [with] his priests וְשָׂרָ֖יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes [יַחַד כ] (יַחְדָּֽיו׃ <S%H3162><s%> alike ק)

וְיָבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> shall come שֹׁדֵ֜ד <S%H7703><s%> And the spoiler אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> upon every city וְעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> and no city לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תִמָּלֵ֔ט <S%H4422><s%> shall escape וְאָבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> also shall perish הָעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> the valley וְנִשְׁמַ֣ד <S%H8045><s%> shall be destroyed הַמִּישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> and the plain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD

תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give צִ֣יץ <S%H6731><s%> wings לְמוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> unto Moab כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that it נָצֹ֖א <S%H5323><s%> that it may flee תֵּצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> and get away וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5892><s%> for the cities לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> thereof shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֔ינָה <S%H1961><s%> will become מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> without any to dwell בָּהֵֽן׃ <S%H2004><s%> therein

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> [be] he that doeth מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> the work יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רְמִיָּ֑ה <S%H7423><s%> deceitfully וְאָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> and cursed מֹנֵ֥עַ <S%H4513><s%> [be] he that keepeth back חַרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2719><s%> his sword מִדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> from blood

שַׁאֲנַ֨ן <S%H7599><s%> hath been at ease מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab מִנְּעוּרָ֗יו <S%H5271><s%> from his youth וְשֹׁקֵ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> and he hath settled הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמָרָ֔יו <S%H8105><s%> on his lees וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הוּרַ֤ק <S%H7324><s%> and hath not been emptied מִכְּלִי֙ <S%H3627><s%> from vessel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֔לִי <S%H3627><s%> to vessel וּבַגּוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1473><s%> into captivity לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> neither hath he gone עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עָמַ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> remained טַעְמוֹ֙ <S%H2940><s%> therefore his taste בּ֔וֹ וְרֵיח֖וֹ <S%H7381><s%> in him and his scent לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נָמָֽר׃ <S%H4171><s%> is not changed ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּ֖ה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> that I will send ל֥וֹ צֹעִ֖ים <S%H6808><s%> unto him wanderers וְצֵעֻ֑הוּ <S%H6808><s%> that shall cause him to wander וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> his vessels יָרִ֔יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> and shall empty וְנִבְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5035><s%> their bottles יְנַפֵּֽצוּ׃ <S%H5310><s%> and break

וּבֹ֥שׁ <S%H954><s%> shall be ashamed מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> And Moab מִכְּמ֑וֹשׁ <S%H3645><s%> of Chemosh כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בֹּ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H954><s%> was ashamed בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> as the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִבֵּ֥ית אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel מִבְטֶחָֽם׃ <S%H4009><s%> their confidence

אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תֹּֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> How say גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> ye We [are] mighty אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> and strong לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> battle

שֻׁדַּ֤ד <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> Moab וְעָרֶ֣יהָ <S%H5892><s%> [out of] her cities עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> and gone up וּמִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> and his chosen בַּֽחוּרָ֖יו <S%H970><s%> young men יָרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> are gone down לַטָּ֑בַח <S%H2875><s%> Tebah נְאֻ֨ם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the King יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> whose name

קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near אֵיד־ <S%H343><s%> The calamity מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab לָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come וְרָ֣עָת֔וֹ <S%H7451><s%> and his affliction מִהֲרָ֖ה <S%H4116><s%> hasteth מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> fast

נֻ֤דוּ <S%H5110><s%> him bemoan לוֹ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִיבָ֔יו <S%H5439><s%> All ye that are about וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יֹדְעֵ֣י <S%H3045><s%> him and all ye that know שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name אִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> say אֵיכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> how נִשְׁבַּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> broken מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> staff עֹ֔ז <S%H5797><s%> How is the strong מַקֵּ֖ל <S%H4731><s%> rod תִּפְאָרָֽה׃ <S%H8597><s%> [and] the beautiful

רְדִ֤י <S%H3381><s%> come down מִכָּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> from [thy] glory [יֹשְׁבֶי כ] (וּשְׁבִ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and sit ק) בַצָּמָ֔א <S%H6772><s%> in thirst יֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that dost inhabit בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> Thou daughter דִּיב֑וֹן <S%H1769><s%> Dibon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For שֹׁדֵ֤ד <S%H7703><s%> for the spoiler מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עָ֣לָה <S%H5927><s%> shall come בָ֔ךְ שִׁחֵ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> upon thee [and] he shall destroy מִבְצָרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H4013><s%> thy strong holds

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by דֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way עִמְדִ֥י <S%H5975><s%> stand וְצַפִּ֖י <S%H6822><s%> and espy יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> O inhabitant עֲרוֹעֵ֑ר <S%H6177><s%> of Aroer שַׁאֲלִי־ <S%H7592><s%> ask נָ֣ס <S%H5127><s%> him that fleeth וְנִמְלָ֔טָה <S%H4422><s%> and her that escapeth אִמְרִ֖י <S%H559><s%> [and] say מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נִּֽהְיָֽתָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> What is done

הֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is confounded מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חַ֖תָּה <S%H2865><s%> for it is broken down [הֵילִילִי כ] (הֵילִ֣ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> howl ק) [וּזְעָקִי כ] (וּֽזְעָ֑קוּ <S%H2199><s%> assemble ק) הַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> tell בְאַרְנ֔וֹן <S%H769><s%> ye it in Arnon כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> that Moab

וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> And judgment בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> is come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country הַמִּישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> upon the plain אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon חֹל֥וֹן <S%H2473><s%> upon Holon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יַ֖הְצָה <S%H3096><s%> and upon Jahazah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against [מֹופָעַת כ] (מֵיפָֽעַת׃ <S%H4158><s%> Mephaath ק)

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against דִּיב֣וֹן <S%H1769><s%> And upon Dibon וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נְב֔וֹ <S%H5015><s%> and upon Nebo וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֖ית דִּבְלָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H1015><s%> and upon Bethdiblathaim

וְעַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> against קִרְיָתַ֛יִם <S%H7156><s%> And upon Kiriathaim וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֥ית גָּמ֖וּל <S%H1014><s%> and upon Bethgamul וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֥ית מְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1010><s%> and upon Bethmeon

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against קְרִיּ֖וֹת <S%H7152><s%> And upon Kerioth וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּצְרָ֑ה <S%H1224><s%> and upon Bozrah וְעַ֗ל <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵי֙ <S%H5892><s%> and upon all the cities אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab הָרְחֹק֖וֹת <S%H7350><s%> far וְהַקְּרֹבֽוֹת׃ <S%H7138><s%> or near

נִגְדְּעָה֙ <S%H1438><s%> is cut off קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> The horn מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> and his arm נִשְׁבָּ֑רָה <S%H7665><s%> is broken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הַשְׁכִּירֻ֕הוּ <S%H7937><s%> Make ye him drunken כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [himself] against the LORD הִגְדִּ֑יל <S%H1431><s%> for he magnified וְסָפַ֤ק <S%H5606><s%> also shall wallow מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> Moab בְּקִיא֔וֹ <S%H6892><s%> in his vomit וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לִשְׂחֹ֖ק <S%H7814><s%> and he also shall be in derision גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> to you

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <S%H518><s%> Or ל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not הַשְּׂחֹ֗ק <S%H7814><s%> a derision הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> For was not Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or בְּגַנָּבִ֖ים <S%H1767><s%> time [נִמְצָאָה כ] (נִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> be able ק) כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִדֵּ֧י <S%H1767><s%> time דְבָרֶ֥יךָ <S%H1697><s%> thou spakest בּ֖וֹ תִּתְנוֹדָֽד׃ <S%H5110><s%> of him thou skippedst
